column2: "Oh, you came too... Excellent, I'll take care of you both!"
"I, Dark Falz [Apprentice], will take care of these ARKS together."
"I won't fight you..."
"What did you say?! You ARKS dare to mock me?!"
"Exactly what I've said, I won't fight. I do not want to fight someone who has a death wish."
"Even if you have done bad things, I will not fight you."
"I cannot fight someone who is crying from within their heart."
"Crying...? From within? Are you stupid?!"
"\"... You shouldn't allow others to decide for you.\" That's what Maria has taught me."
"There's people who think of you as a Dark Falz, but there's others who don't see you as a Dark Falz."
"So I ask... What do you see yourself as?"

"Are you a Dark Falz, or are you not?
What do you think of yourself?"
"That's..."
"If you don't know, and if you don't understand what to do. Then the only thing you can do is cry."
"Haha... my hips just gave out. It's great she stopped."
"That person was lost. Without able to decide on their own, they're suffering inside."
"Surely, up till now, that person was a puppet, I think..."

"I also experienced something
similar, so I understand what it's
like. I couldn't leave that person alone."

"Maria took a single look at that
person, and knew it was a Dark Falz."
"But, taking a look myself, I did not see that person as a Dark Falz."
"I think my instincts might be right after all."
